txt.en: Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr has asked you to help her warriors prepare for the coming battle.\n\nYou should complete quests in Bhol Rûdh.
Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr can be found in the village Bhol Rûdh.\n\nYou should talk to Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr.
Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr, the chieftain of the Red Sky Clan, can be found in the village Bhol Rûdh.\n\nYou should find Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr.
Ghai-buri-Sêk can be found outside the mountain pass in north-east Agarnaith.\n\nYou should talk to Ghai-buri-Sêk.
Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr, the chieftain of the Red Sky Clan, can be found in the village Bhol Rûdh.\n\nYou should talk to Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. We fight for our fallen and we fight for our homeland.'
'Come, speak to Chieftain. I will take you.'
'We are Nêbh Rûdh, Red Sky Clan. I take you to village. Speak when ready.'

'I am Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr, Chieftain of Red Sky Clan. You are safe in Bhol Rûdh. But tell us: who are you, and why you come?'

You explain that you come from a land far to the west, beyond the mountains, that you were at war with Sauron, and seek to quell any further threat from his remaining forces in Mordor. You politely ask for help dealing with Seregost and Kala-gijak.

'You are honest. Good. We share enemies. We will help with Kala-gijak, but to attack Seregost is death. Warriors went there, did not come back. Winged demons protect it.

'Ghai-buri-Sêk will lead warriors against gorgûn fort. Help them prepare.'
You've earned the trust of the Red Sky Clan and have been invited to enter their village and meet the chieftain, Parsâ-dhug-Bhêr. She asks for help preparing her people for war with the Uruk-hai.
